insert_obs_data module¶

Insert observation data

This script allows the user to insert observation data into Dataex server. It takes as input the json file containing the observations.

Usage:

$ get_obs_data.py

param country_id

station id

type country_id

int

param p_id

parameter id

type p_id

int

param obs_data

input file either csv or excel

type obs_data

str

insert_obs_data.create_json(file, country_id)¶

Creates a json file

Parameters

  • file (object) – dataframe

  • country_id (str) – Id of country entered by the user

Returns

a json file containing rows of observation data

Return type

json

dataex-client
